sentences.sContent: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.sCn: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.sContent: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.sCn: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.sContent: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.sCn: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

trans.tranOther: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack
